title: America Speaks, When will Our Hearts Listen: WHEN AMERICA BURN, SO DOES OUR CONSCIENCE
description: America has spoken, and now it is time our hearts collectively listen. From the riots in Baltimore, and majority of America's living below the poverty line, it is time we concern ourselves with America's future. This book is a collection of citizens across America that is tired of the problems Washington politicians keep ignoring. It is time we stand up against police brutality, domestic violence and deplorable living conditions of those working starvation wages in America.
author: Kristin  Hannah
